package.name: NFCWriter XS
package.shortDescription: NFCWriter XS for iOS 11/12/13 cracked by PotatsoEXP

descriptionlist.description: Scan. Write. Copy. Format. Emulate. Serve.
Scan your NFC tags, Credit/Debit Cards, MRTD Documents (passports, ID Cards) on your iPhone!

You can also have
a multi-line item.
